Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than $8,000. Considering its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects the high quality and unique features of the product, ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. I trust this offer aligns with your expectations and would be delighted to facilitate the transaction if you're interested. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
